title: Wall Street Breakfast March 11: Extreme Market Volatility
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Extreme volatility continues, as U.S. futures follow Monday's plunge and Tuesday's rally with a 2% drop overnight as traders sized up fiscal and monetary policy responses. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
